data.name: The Ascent - Winter Pack
data.detailed_description:
To celebrate the festive season, we're giving all players The Winter Pack as a free gift, it is the season of giving after all!

Download the Winter Pack and get festive with the following new content:

A new makeshift hand grenade:
  • Snowball: Throw with the intent to stagger but not kill - to be jolly and not homicidal. A snowball fight is a always fun and games, until someone loses an eye. Remember, play ice!

Three new fashion apparels:
  • Buttercup headgear: 'Tis the season of a strange Veles. Horrible visibility, highly flammable and with questionable street cred.
  • Red Danger headgear: Warm your nose and make a statement to boot. A bright red nose like a true alpha, and antlers for immediate intimidation. Don't listen to the fools that say you look silly.
  • Festive shirt: A festive Winter T-shirt

Happy Winter!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Tis the Season of giving, and we're giving all players a free Winter Pack! Download it for free and get the perfect festive look with the snowball grenade and three new fashion apparels that will make you stand out like no other on Veles.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 ( 2048 MB) / Radeon R9 390X (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Specification listed above allows gameplay experience close to 30 FPS on average while using 1080p resolution and lowest settings
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K (4 * 4000) or equivalent / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (6 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 (8192 MB) / Radeon RX 5700 (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The Recommended Specification listed below allows gameplay experience close to 60 FPS on average while using 1080p resolution and overall “High” settings:

data.legal_notice: The Ascent  © 2021 Neon Giant AB. Licensed by Curve Digital Publishing Ltd.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features violence, gore and bad language.
